description: Comprehensive printer and print queue information

printer_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%' AND type = 'subkey' AND name NOT IN ('DefaultSpoolDirectory', 'ResetDevmodesAttempts', 'LANGIDOfLastDefaultDevmode');

printer_details.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%\%' AND name IN ('Port', 'Printer Driver', 'Location', 'Description', 'Share Name', 'Server', 'Attributes', 'Priority') AND data != '';

printer_drivers_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Environments\%';

printer_ports_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Monitors\%';

spooler_service.query: SELECT name, status, start_type, path, display_name, description FROM services WHERE name = 'Spooler';

spooler_settings.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\%' AND name IN ('DefaultSpoolDirectory', 'BeepEnabled', 'NetPopup', 'LogEvents', 'RestartJobOnPoolError', 'RestartJobOnPoolEnabled', 'PortThreadPriority', 'PortThreadPriorityClass', 'SchedulerThreadPriority', 'SchedulerThreadPriorityClass') AND data != '';
spooler_settings.description: Print spooler configuration settings from registry

print_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE (path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Printers\%' OR path LIKE 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Printers\%') AND data != '';

printer_security.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%\Security' AND data != '';

shared_printers.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\lanmanserver\Shares\%' AND data != '';

print_processor_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Environments\%\Print Processors\%' AND data != '';

printer_status_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%\PrinterDriverData' AND data != '';
printer_status_registry.description: Printer status and configuration data from registry
